name: Yo-Kai Watch 3
synopsis: Get ready for a tale of two heroes in two cities in YO-KAI WATCH™ 3, only for Nintendo 3DS family systems. Join Nate as he adapts to life in the strange new town of St. Peanutsburg, and help Hailey Anne – Springdale’s newest hero – open up her very own Yo-kai Detective Agency in a hemisphere-spanning adventure! Switch between two wacky stories, battle all-new bosses, befriend over 600 Yo-kai, and master a fresh grid-based battle system in the biggest Yo-kai adventure yet!
